task.title: Create Load Balancer - Network and Security
task.shortdesc: This tab is present for all AWS clouds and Euca VPC-enabled clouds only. This step allows you to define a VPC network and assign a security group to your load balancer.

step.cmd: Select the name of the VPC from the VPC network drop-down list.
step.info: For a non-VPC AWS cloud, select No VPC.
step.stepresult: The Security groups option displays if a VPC network is selected.

step.cmd: Select a security group to assign to the network from the Security groups drop-down list.
Click Next to proceed to the Instances tab.
